name: Pinball Revisited
description:
If pinball machines had pay-to-win mechanics, maybe it look a bit like this...

"Pinball:Revisited" is a single table Pinball game where you can buy your way to multi-ball, easy mode, and 3 game modes. You can grind your way to those features with skill, patience, and tons of quarters but why not just unlock them from the start? 

Note:

Hi! This game is made for the Dream Arcade Archive Game Jam 2020. My idea is to pay homage to my fav arcade and pinball machines but with a slight modern twist! Hope you will give it a go and be entertained for a few minutes! 

- returntosender
